item.description:
Ok so for those who have been to the East Boston location you all know that this place is absolutely the best.

Let's go out to the Peabody location and see if it meets our expectations. A few things about this event:

1. Expect there to be a wait, no reservations are accepted.
2. We believe this is CASH ONLY, so please bring cash along
3. Expect there to be a wait, no reservations are accepted.
4. Bring the Meetup Cell number (978-304-2811)with you in case you are running late.
5. Expect there to be a wait, no reservations are accepted.

Don't forget it is now November and we are accepting supply donations for the Lazarus House in Lawrence.

If you have not paid your dues for this year, please be prepared to pay them at this event.

Hope to see you at Santarpio's.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance
item.name: Let's Check out the new Santarpio's
